title: Nintendo Switch 2’s Strength Threatened by Memory ‘Horror Show’
description: The fastest-selling game console of all time may not be enough to shelter Nintendo Co.’s stock from growing investor fears about skyrocketing memory prices.
content: The fastest-selling game console of all time may not be enough to shelter Nintendo Co.’s stock from growing investor fears about skyrocketing memory prices.
